scripts.start: npx sass --no-source-map src/scss:src/_includes/css && concurrently 'npx sass --no-source-map src/scss:src/_includes/css --watch' 'npx eleventy --serve'
scripts.predeploy: npx sass --no-source-map src/scss:src/_includes/css && NODE_ENV=production npx eleventy
scripts.production: npx sass --no-source-map src/scss:src/_includes/css && NODE_ENV=production npx eleventy
scripts.start-production: npx sass --no-source-map src/scss:src/_includes/css && NODE_ENV=production concurrently 'npx sass --no-source-map src/scss:src/_includes/css --watch' 'npx eleventy --serve'
